title: Operations Management (Supply Chain) 10th Global c2013 Krajewski
description:
Operations Management: Processes and Supply Chains, 10th Global Edition (c2013), textbook by Lee J. Krajewski, Larry P. Ritzman and Manoj K. Malhotra.

TEXTBOOK INFO:
Global 10th Edition: <a href=" http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/catalog/academic/product?ISBN=9780273766834-IS" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/catalog/academic/product?ISBN=9780273766834-IS</a>
National 10th Edition: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780132807395" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780132807395</a>

DOWNLOAD CENTER: <a href=" http://media.pearsoncmg.com/ph/bp/bridgepages/bp_krajewski_bridgepage/krajewski10_downloadcenter.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://media.pearsoncmg.com/ph/bp/bridgepages/bp_krajewski_bridgepage/krajewski10_downloadcenter.html</a>

BRIEF CONTENTS:
---------------
PART 1 - Creating Value Through Operations Management
 1. Using Operations to Compete
  Supplement A: Decision Making
 2. Project Management
PART 2 - Managing Processes
 3. Process Strategy
 4. Process Analysis
 5. Quality and Performance
 6. Capacity Planning
  Supplement B: Waiting Lines
 7. Constraint Management
 8. Lean Systems
PART 3 - Managing Supply Chains
 9. Supply Chain Inventory Management
  Supplement C: Special Inventory Models
 10. Supply Chain Design
 11. Supply Chain Location Decisions
 12. Supply Chain Integration
 13. Supply Chain Sustainability and Humanitarian Logistics
 14. Forecasting
 15. Operations Planning and Scheduling
 16. Resource Planning
  Supplement D: Linear Programming
APPENDICES:
 1: Normal Distribution
 2: Table of Random Numbers
SUPPLEMENTS:
 E: Simulation
 F: Financial Analysis
 G: Acceptance Sampling Plans
 H: Measuring Output Rates
 I: Learning Curve Analysis

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF
